homePage.announcement: Siyakwamukela ku-Vitu Finance! Qala uhambo lwakho lwe-crypto olusekelwa yi-AI namuhla.
homePage.introText: I-Vitu Finance iyirobhothi ye-AI yomkhakha wezinto ze-Worldcoin enikeza izinsizakalo zokweluleka ezisebenzi, kuhlanganise nokuqondiswa kokubhalisa, ukuphathwa kwesikhwama nemvikelo yokubethela kokuphepha. Ngosistimu yokuvuselela ezenzakalelayo, isekela izinsizakalo zamalimi amaningi emhlabeni wonke, ihlose ukukhula kanye nabasebenzisi nokwabelana ngempumelelo yomkhakha we-Worldcoin.
homePage.worldcoinText1: I-AI izodala umhlaba wenala, kodwa ngesikhathi esifanayo, sidinga ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu uzuza kule ngcebo engenakucatshangwa. I-Worldcoin izinikele ekwakheni umnotho womhlaba onobulungisa futhi ohlanganyelayo.
homePage.worldcoinText2: Lokhu kungaphezu komsebenzi wezomnotho, kumayelana nesithunzi somuntu.

pledgePage.description: I-Worldcoin ihlose ukunikeza ukufinyelela komhlaba wonke emnothweni womhlaba, kungakhathalekile ukuthi uvela kuphi noma unembabazelo muni. Dala indawo yokuthi sonke sizuze enkathini yobuhlakani bokwenziwa, lapho ungafaka khona i-WLD yakho ukuze uthole izinzuzo eziningi.

robotPage.title: I-Robot ye-AI
robotPage.announcement: iqala uhlelo lokuqasha abangane bokuhlola lomphakathi emhlabeni wonke
robotPage.description: I-Vitu Finance isebenzisa amasu okulinganisa egridi aphezulu nge-AI, ehlose ukunciphisa ingozi kuyilapho yandisa inzuzo. Ibheka amakhulu amaphethini okuhweba ku-CEX ne-DEX ukuze ifeze inzuzo ezenzakalelayo.
robotPage.depositReturnNote: Idiphozithi nengeniso izobuyiswa uma kuphela isikhathi

invitePage.announcement: yethula uhlelo lwemiklomelo yomlingani wokuqasha wokuhlolwa komphakathi womhlaba wonke
invitePage.inviteFriendSubtitle: You and your friend will receive bonuses
invitePage.cexReferralDesc: Invite friends to activate CEX robots to get 50% of the 8th level quantitative profit reward
invitePage.cexReferralLevels: Level 1-30% Level 2-10% Level 3-5% Level 4-1% Level 5-1% Level 6-1% Level 7-1% Level 8-1%
invitePage.cexReferralExample: For example: if you directly promote 10 members to use robots to complete work, and they earn a total of 1,000 USDT on the day, you will receive a 300 USDT/day reward, and so on, the more you share, the more you earn.
invitePage.dexReferralDesc: Invite friends to start the DEX robot to get a referral reward of the startup amount
invitePage.dexLevel1: Recommend a first-level startup robot and reward 5% of the startup amount
invitePage.dexLevel2: Recommend the second-level startup robot to reward 3% of the startup amount
invitePage.dexLevel3: Recommend level three startup robots to reward 2% of the startup amount
invitePage.connectWalletHint: Connect wallet to get invite link

followPage.description: Vitu Finance uses high-frequency grid quantitative strategies through AI, aiming to reduce risk while maximizing returns. It monitors hundreds of trading pairs on CEX and DEX to achieve automatic profits.
followPage.depositReturnNote: Deposit and income will be returned when due
followPage.walletNotExist: Wallet address does not exist, please connect your wallet first
followPage.insufficientBalance: Insufficient USDT balance, please deposit first
followPage.dailyLimitReached: Ungathola irobot elilodwa lolu hlobo ngosuku

captionPage.faq1Title: I-Vitu Finance isebenza kanjani ukuthola imali engenayo?
captionPage.faq1Content: Umgomo wokusebenza we-Vitu Finance ukusebenzisa amarobhothi okulinganisa ukwenza ukuhwebelana kwamarobhothi okulinganisa ku-Binance, Coinbase noma ezimakethe ezinkulu ze-cryptocurrency, futhi ufinyelele ngokuzenzakalelayo ku-API yokushintshana. Isebenzisa ubuchwepheshe be-AI ukuguqula amasu njalo nokubuyekeza idatha, irobhothi iqhubeka nokuthola izimo zezimakethe futhi izuze umehluko wentengo ngokuhweba kwamandla aphezulu, ngaleyo ndlela izuze izinzuzo. Sijoyine ukuhlola umngcele wobuhlakani bokwenziwa!
captionPage.faq2Title: Kunezinhlobo ezimbili zamarobhothi wokulinganisa i-AI trend
captionPage.faq2Content1: Irobhothi lokulinganisa i-AI trend ye-Vitu Finance lisebenzisa isu lokulinganisa igridi yamafrikhwensi aphezulu, eliqonde ekunciphiseni ubungozi kanti likhulisa imbuyiselo. Liqapha amakhulu ezimbili zokuhweba ku-CEX ne-DEX, liphucule amasu okuhweba ngokuzenzakalelayo ngokufunda okujulile nokuhlaziywa kwedatha enkulu, futhi lithole inzuzo ezenzakalelayo.
captionPage.faq2CexContent:
ngaleyo ndlela lithole izinzuzo. Joyina kithi ukuhlola umngcele wobuhlakani bokwenziwa!
I-CEX-Robots iyirobhothi elixhuma ekuhwebeleni okugxile maphakathi nge-API. I-Binance, i-Coinbase yizindawo zokuhweba ezigxile maphakathi. Ngemva kokuvula irobhothi, ungathola imali engenayo eqinile nsuku zonke. Idiphozithi yokuvula irobhothi izobuyiselwa ku-akhawunti yakho lapho iphelelwa yisikhathi.
captionPage.faq2DexContent: I-DEX-Robots iyirobhothi lezindawo zokuhweba ezingagxile maphakathi. I-PancakeSwap, i-Uniswap yizindawo zokuhweba ezingagxile maphakathi. Ngemva kokuvula irobhothi, udinga ukuqeda umsebenzi nsuku zonke. Ngemva kokuphela kwesikhathi semiholo nediphozithi, izokhokhwa ku-akhawunti yakho ndawonye. Imbuyiselo iphakeme kune-CEX-Robots.
captionPage.faq3Step1: 1. Bhalisa i-akhawunti ye-DAPP ngokusebenzisa isixhumanisi sememo senkundla kusiphequluli sesikhwama se-crypto
captionPage.faq3Step2: 2. Khetha uhlobo lwerobhothi elinani ofuna ukuhlanganyela futhi uqale irobhothi
captionPage.faq3Step3: 3. Qeda ama-oda okuhweba amarobhothi elinani nsuku zonke ukuze uthole inzuzo ye-arbitrage
captionPage.faq3Step4: 4. Khuthaza amalungu eqembu ukuba ahlanganyele ukuze uthole imiklomelo yokukhangisa ephana ngemali engenayo yeqembu
captionPage.faq4Title: Indlela yokuqala irobhothi le-Vitu Finance ukuze uthole imali engenayo yansuku zonke?
captionPage.faq4Step1: 1. Khetha uhlobo lwerobhothi ofuna lona ekhasini "Robot", bese uchofoza inkinobho ethi "Qala"
captionPage.faq4Step2: 2. Ekhasini "Irobhothi Lami", chofoza inkinobho ethi "Qala Ukulinganisa" ukuze uqede i-oda ye-arbitrage yanamuhla
captionPage.faq4Step3: 3. Linda amasekhondi angamashumi ukuze uqede umsebenzi wobuningi futhi uthole inzuzo yanamuhla
captionPage.faq4Note1: -Buyekeza ama-oda erobhothi osuku ngemva kuka-00:00 (UTC) nsuku zonke, ngaphandle kokulinda amahora angama-24
captionPage.faq4Note2: -Kumele uchofoza ngesandla "Qala Ukulinganisa" nsuku zonke ukuze uqede umsebenzi we-oda ukuze uthole imali engenayo elinani yalosuku
captionPage.faq5Title: Kungani ngidinga ukukhokhela idiphozithi ukuze ngiqale irobhothi lisebenze?
captionPage.faq5Content1: Ngoba sisayine ama-oda alinani asebenzayo nezindawo zokuhweba ezinkulu nezinhlaka zenkampani yesithathu, sinikezela ama-oda kumalungu avula amarobhothi we-arbitrage yansuku zonke.
captionPage.faq5Content2: Uma umuntu ehlanganyela emsebenzini futhi ayeke ngaphandle kokukhokhela idiphozithi, noma uma irobhothi livuliwe kodwa lihluleka ukudala izinzuzo okubangela ukuba lishiywe, akuyona kuphela izindleko zethu zokwakha irobhothi ezizosuswa, kodwa sizokhokhela nenani elikhulu lezinhlawulo zokukhiphiswa kwezinye izinkampani.
captionPage.faq6Title: Irobhothi lingafinyelela imali engenayo yama-2%-3%/usuku. Ingabe ukukhiqizwa kuzoncishiswa esikhathini esizayo?
captionPage.faq6Content1: Njengamanje, imali engenayo yesilinganiso serobhothi le-Vitu Finance elisha kakhulu ingafinyelela ku-3%/usuku. Ngoba irobhothi lethu le-quantum elikhethekile eliphakeme liqhubekela phambili nokuthuthukiswa nokuphindaphinda ngokuziphatha kwelinani okukhiqizwa abasebenzisi bomhlaba wonke abasebenzisa ukuguqulwa kwesiqalo esidala se-Vitu Finance, luphule ubulungiswa bobuchwepheshe obuyisisekelo.
captionPage.faq6Content2: Empeleni, emkhakheni we-crypto, imali engenayo elinani yezinkampani eziphezulu isivele ikhulisa imali engenayo yonyaka izikhathi eziningana. Kodwa-ke, ngenxa yokuthi umkhawulo wezobuchwepheshe uphakeme kakhulu futhi unomthelela omkhulu ekugcweleni komkhakha phakathi kobenonotho nabampofu, akukaze kuthengiswe kubasebenzisi ngabanye noma kumenyezelwe emhlabeni wangaphandle.
captionPage.faq6Content3: Ukuzalwa kwe-Vitu Finance ukwephula ubulungiswa bobuchwepheshe bamakhampani, ukuze bonke abantu abavamile bakwazi ukuhlanganyela ekulinganiseni ngokucofa kanye ngokuhlakani kokwenziwa kwe-AI futhi bajabulele izinzuzo zokuqala zemboni.
captionPage.faq6Content4: Njengoba umkhawulo wobuchwepheshe bobuningi unciphile futhi imboni iba yinto evamile, imithombo yenzuzo namazinga okubuyisela ubungozi kokubuyisela okunani kuzoncishiswa, futhi izinzuzo ezikhiqizwayo zizoncishiswa ngokwemvelo. Imali engenayo yamarobhothi akhishelwa muva kungenzeka yehle esikhathini esizayo.

levelPage.title: BROKER SYSTEM
levelPage.level1Conditions: Directly promote 5 people to start coinbase or above robots, and the total performance of the team is >1000USDT
levelPage.level1Salary: Daily dividend 5USDT, monthly income 150 USDT, daily flash exchange 1 WLD
levelPage.level2Conditions: Directly promote 10 people to start coinbase or above robots, there are 2 first-level brokers in the team, and the total performance of the team is >5000USDT
levelPage.level2Salary: Daily dividend 15USDT, monthly income 450USDT, daily flash exchange 2 WLD
levelPage.level3Conditions: Directly promote 20 people to start coinbase or above robots, there are 2 second-level brokers in the team, and the total performance of the team is >20000USDT
levelPage.level3Salary: Daily dividend 60USDT, monthly income 1800USDT, daily flash exchange 3 WLD
levelPage.level4Conditions: Directly promote 30 people to start coinbase or above robots, there are 2 third-level brokers in the team, and the total performance of the team is >80000USDT
levelPage.level4Salary: Daily dividend 300USDT, monthly income 9000USDT, daily flash exchange 5 WLD
levelPage.level5Conditions: Directly promote 50 people to start coinbase or above robots, there are 2 fourth-level brokers in the team, and the total performance of the team is >200000USDT
levelPage.level5Salary: Daily dividend 1000USDT, monthly income 30000USDT, daily flash exchange 10 WLD
levelPage.noteContent: Upgrade to the first-level broker and receive a reward of 5 USDT per day, 150 USDT per month. 1 WLD can be redeemed every day, and the number of people can be directly promoted. If the total amount of the team does not meet the upgrade conditions, it will be automatically downgraded. The higher the team level, the more WLD can be redeemed for USDT.

dailyReward.title: Umklomelo wansuku zonke
dailyReward.description: Qoqa izinhlamvu zokungena emdlalweni nsuku zonke ngaphandle kokuphuthuma
dailyReward.connectWalletHint: Sicela uxhume isikhwama sakho ukubona nokubiza imiklomelo yansuku zonke

signatureAuthPopup.title: Ukuqinisekisa Ukusayina (Ukuphepha kwe-Wallet)
signatureAuthPopup.lead: Ukuze sivikele i-wallet yakho futhi siqinisekise ukuthi ikheli lingelakho, sizocela ukusayina umlayezo kanye kuphela ku-TokenPocket in-app browser. I-wallet yakho ingacela iphasiwedi/biometrics ukuze ivule ukhiye wangasese endaweni (local). Asikaze sithole iphasiwedi noma ukhiye wangasese wakho.
signatureAuthPopup.complianceItem1Desc: I-wallet isebenzisa ukhiye wangasese ukuze isayine umlayezo, iqinisekise ubunikazi bekheli futhi igunyaze izenzo ezisemthethweni (lapha: ukungena/ukuqinisekisa ubuwena).
signatureAuthPopup.complianceItem2Desc: Isinyathelo sokuqinisekisa sendawo ukuze kuvulwe i-wallet futhi kuvunyelwe ukusayina, kuvimbela ukusetshenziswa okungagunyaziwe.
signatureAuthPopup.securityItem1: Lokhu ukusayina umlayezo kuphela. Akukho ukuthengiselana ku-chain, akukho gas, akukho ukudlulisa/ukugunyaza.
signatureAuthPopup.securityItem2: Asisoze sacela i-mnemonic/ukhiye wangasese/iphasiwedi ye-wallet. Iphasiwedi isetshenziswa endaweni (local) yi-wallet kuphela ukuze ivumele ukusayina.
signatureAuthPopup.securityItem3: Sicela uqinisekise ukuthi i-domain ingu {domain} futhi umlayezo wokusayina uwukwokuqinisekisa ukungena kuphela.
signatureAuthPopup.summaryText: Ukusayina umlayezo ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukungena (akukho transaction). Iphasiwedi/biometrics iqinisekiswa endaweni (local) futhi ayabelwana newebhusayithi.
signatureAuthPopup.biometricDesc:
Ukuze uthole isignesha elula kakhulu, sincoma ukuvula ukubona ubuso noma isandla esikhwameni sakho se-TokenPocket.

Indlela: TokenPocket â†’ Izilungiselelo â†’ Izilungiselelo Zokuphepha â†’ I-Biometric

maintenance.title: Ukulungiswa Kwesistimu
maintenance.message: Isistimu ikhona kulungiswa. Sicela uzame futhi emva kwamahora angu-2. Siyabonga ngokubekezela kwakho.
